item.title: 317 delta combat skills bug
item.dc:creator: @skillingman8 skillingman8
item.description:
@skillingman8 wrote:

Hello,
I am have a combat skill glitch,

when i go to rockcrabs and start leveling any one of my combat skills.

I hit the crab once and my level goes to 97.
although the exp rates look alrightâ€¦
Here is the exp rates:

if (UseBow || UseCrossBow) { TotalExp = (double) (60 * hitDiff * 2); TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), 4); } else if (FightType != 3) { TotalExp = (double) (60 * hitDiff * 2); TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), SkillID); } else { TotalExp = (double) (60 * hitDiff * 2); TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerAttack); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerDefence); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength); } TotalExp = (double) (60 * hitDiff * 2); TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerHitpoints); attackTimer = 7;
